name: Delphi Compiled Unit
summary: A DCU file is a compiled unit created by Embarcadero Delphi, a software development environment used to build Windows applications. It contains machine code compiled from a Pascal source file ( .PAS ) using the Delphi compiler. DCU files typically share the same name as their source file, for example, compiling module.pas generates module.dcu .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
